location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区复兴门外大街2号
location.en: No. 2, Fuxingmenwai Street, Xicheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家级广播电台，自2018年起隶属于中央广播电视总台。
description.en: The national radio station of the People's Republic of China, subordinate to the China Media Group since 2018.

description.zh-cn: 由原中央电视台、中央人民广播电台、中国国际广播电台合并组建的国务院直属事业单位，归中共中央宣传部领导。
description.en: A state media conglomerate of the People's Republic of China, formed by the merger of CCTV, CNR, and CRI, under the leadership of the CCP's Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台的前身。
description.en: The predecessor of China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台的前身之一，由延安新华广播电台改名而来。
description.en: One of the predecessors of China National Radio, renamed from Yan'an Xinhua Radio Station.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台的前身之一，由陕北新华广播电台改名而来。
description.en: One of the predecessors of China National Radio, renamed from Northern Shaanxi Xinhua Radio Station.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台的前身之一，由北平新华广播电台改名而来。
description.en: One of the predecessors of China National Radio, renamed from Beiping Xinhua Radio Station.

en: Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leadership body of the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国开国大典

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国大典
en: Proclamation of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立的标志性事件。
description.en: The landmark event marking the founding of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 北京市的广播电台。
description.en: The radio station of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家对外广播电台。
description.en: The state-owned external radio broadcaster of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 深化党和国家机构改革方案

zh-cn: 深化党和国家机构改革方案

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央印发的指导中国党和国家机构改革的文件。
description.en: A document issued by the CCP Central Committee guiding the reform of China's party and state institutions.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家电视台。
description.en: The national television broadcaster of the People's Republic of China.

en: Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管意识形态方面工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party responsible for ideological work.

description.zh-cn: 中国的国家级应急广播机构，设在中央人民广播电台。
description.en: China's national emergency broadcasting center, located at China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国务院总理。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国电视购物频道。
description.en: An American television shopping channel.

description.zh-cn: 由中央人民广播电台与QVC合作开办的电视购物频道。
description.en: A television shopping channel jointly launched by China National Radio and QVC.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台下属的音像出版社。
description.en: An audio-visual publishing house subordinate to China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台前台长。
description.en: Former Director of China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台前台长。
description.en: Former Director of China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台前台长。
description.en: Former Director of China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台前台长。
description.en: Former Director of China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台前台长。
description.en: Former Director of China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台前台长。
description.en: Former Director of China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 2018年，根据《深化党和国家机构改革方案》，中央人民广播电台并入新组建的中央广播电视总台。
description.en: In 2018, according to the 'Plan for Deepening the Reform of Party and State Institutions', China National Radio was merged into the newly established China Media Group.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台的前身是1940年12月30日在延安诞生的延安新华广播电台。
description.en: The predecessor of China National Radio was the Yan'an Xinhua Radio Station, born in Yan'an on December 30, 1940.

description.zh-cn: 1947年3月20日晚，延安新华广播电台改名为陕北新华广播电台。
description.en: On the evening of March 20, 1947, Yan'an Xinhua Radio Station was renamed Northern Shaanxi Xinhua Radio Station.

description.zh-cn: 1949年3月25日，陕北新华广播电台开始在北平播音，并改名为“北平新华广播电台”。
description.en: On March 25, 1949, Northern Shaanxi Xinhua Radio Station began broadcasting in Beiping and was renamed 'Beiping Xinhua Radio Station'.

description.zh-cn: 1949年9月27日，因应北平改为北京，“北平新华广播电台”改名为“北京新华广播电台”。
description.en: On September 27, 1949, as Beiping was renamed Beijing, 'Beiping Xinhua Radio Station' was renamed 'Beijing Xinhua Radio Station'.

description.zh-cn: 1949年12月5日，经中共中央批准，北京新华广播电台定名为“中央人民广播电台”。
description.en: On December 5, 1949, with the approval of the CCP Central Committee, Beijing Xinhua Radio Station was officially named 'China National Radio'.

description.zh-cn: 经中共中央批准，北京新华广播电台定名为“中央人民广播电台”。
description.en: With the approval of the CCP Central Committee, Beijing Xinhua Radio Station was officially named 'China National Radio'.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国开国大典

description.zh-cn: 1949年10月1日，北京新华广播电台在天安门广场向全国现场直播中华人民共和国开国大典实况。
description.en: On October 1, 1949, Beijing Xinhua Radio Station broadcasted the Proclamation of the People's Republic of China live from Tiananmen Square to the entire nation.

description.zh-cn: 1955年3月8日，北京人民广播电台并入中央人民广播电台，成为其对首都广播部，后于1961年1月1日重新独立建台。
description.en: On March 8, 1955, Beijing People's Radio Station was merged into China National Radio, becoming its department for broadcasting to the capital, and was re-established as an independent station on January 1, 1961.

description.zh-cn: 1978年5月1日，中央人民广播电台对海外广播部分（北京广播电台）脱离中央台序列，独立分拆并成立“中华人民共和国国际广播电台”。
description.en: On May 1, 1978, the overseas broadcasting section of China National Radio (Radio Beijing) was separated and established as the independent 'China Radio International'.

relationships.source: 深化党和国家机构改革方案

description.zh-cn: 根据《深化党和国家机构改革方案》，原中央电视台、中央人民广播电台、中国国际广播电台合并，组建新的中央广播电视总台。
description.en: According to the 'Plan for Deepening the Reform of Party and State Institutions', the former China Central Television, China National Radio, and China Radio International were merged to form the new China Media Group.

description.zh-cn: 2018年，原中央电视台与中央人民广播电台、中国国际广播电台合并组建中央广播电视总台。
description.en: In 2018, the former China Central Television merged with China National Radio and China Radio International to form the China Media Group.

description.zh-cn: 2018年，原中央人民广播电台与中央电视台、中国国际广播电台合并组建中央广播电视总台。
description.en: In 2018, the former China National Radio merged with China Central Television and China Radio International to form the China Media Group.

description.zh-cn: 2018年，原中国国际广播电台与中央电视台、中央人民广播电台合并组建中央广播电视总台。
description.en: In 2018, the former China Radio International merged with China Central Television and China National Radio to form the China Media Group.

description.zh-cn: 中央广播电视总台归中共中央宣传部领导。
description.en: The China Media Group is under the leadership of the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 国家应急广播中心在北京揭牌成立，设在中央人民广播电台。
description.en: The National Emergency Broadcasting Center was inaugurated in Beijing and is located at China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 时任国务院总理温家宝来到央广，作为嘉宾参与直播了中国之声特别节目，并主持了纪念座谈会。
description.en: Then-Premier Wen Jiabao visited CNR, participated as a guest in a special live program of 'Voice of China', and presided over a commemorative symposium.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台与QVC合作，开播电视购物频道“央广购物”。
description.en: China National Radio collaborated with QVC to launch the television shopping channel 'CNR Mall'.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台与QVC合作，开播电视购物频道“央广购物”。
description.en: China National Radio collaborated with QVC to launch the television shopping channel 'CNR Mall'.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台与QVC合作，开播电视购物频道“央广购物”。
description.en: China National Radio collaborated with QVC to launch the television shopping channel 'CNR Mall'.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台设有中国广播音像出版社。
description.en: China National Radio has established the China Radio, Film and Television Audio-Visual Publishing House.
